Will this convert to DVD okay?
Can this be good quality, I think not, but if it is you are worthy of your name. ;)

Ok, quality was very good for this filesize, I'm impressed, still think you could have used a few more bit here and there.

However, there is NO SUCH THING as mkv compression, mkv is a _container_ not a _codec_. H.264 is the codec, but mkv means nothing in this regard, it might as well have been mpeg1. ;)
Downloading now, thanks as always for what will no doubt be excellent quality!
